numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that many young people are more optimistic than many older people.
2. I wonder what makes the young generation of Indonesians optimistic about the future of the world.
3. Maybe the young generation of Indonesians has an idea.
4. Maybe this idea can affect the world significantly in the future.
6. This situation shows that people of my generation are different from older people.
7. This situation shows how people of my generation feel about the direction in which the world is heading.
